title: Error when trying to run UIExplorer on android
body:
I'm trying to run the UIExplore example app on android. Steps I've followed: 
1. Cloned
2. `npm install`
3. `npm start` to start the package manager
4. `adb reverse tcp:8081 tcp:8081` because I'm running on device
5. `./gradlew :Examples:UIExplorer:android:app:installDebug`

As soon as the app launches, I get an error stating that an unknown module named invariant was required. It's definitely there in node_modules/fbjs/lib/. Here's the stack trace: 

```
E/ReactNativeJS(10937): Requiring unknown module "invariant". If you are sure the module is there, try restarting the packager or running "npm install".
I/ReactNativeJS(10937): Running application "UIExplorerApp" with appParams: {"initialProps":{},"rootTag":1}. __DEV__ === true, development-level warning are ON, performance optimizations are OFF
E/ReactNativeJS(10937): Application UIExplorerApp has not been registered. This is either due to a require() error during initialization or failure to call AppRegistry.registerComponent.
E/ReactNativeJS(23449): Requiring unknown module "invariant". If you are sure the module is there, try restarting the packager or running "npm install".
I/ReactNativeJS(23449): Running application "UIExplorerApp" with appParams: {"initialProps":{},"rootTag":1}. __DEV__ === true, development-level warning are ON, performance optimizations are OFF
E/ReactNativeJS(23449): Application UIExplorerApp has not been registered. This is either due to a require() error during initialization or failure to call AppRegistry.registerComponent.
E/ReactNativeJS(23449): Requiring unknown module "invariant". If you are sure the module is there, try restarting the packager or running "npm install".
I/ReactNativeJS(23449): Running application "UIExplorerApp" with appParams: {"initialProps":{},"rootTag":1}. __DEV__ === true, development-level warning are ON, performance optimizations are OFF
E/ReactNativeJS(23449): Application UIExplorerApp has not been registered. This is either due to a require() error during initialization or failure to call AppRegistry.registerComponent.
E/ReactNativeJS(23449): Requiring unknown module "invariant". If you are sure the module is there, try restarting the packager or running "npm install".
I/ReactNativeJS(23449): Running application "UIExplorerApp" with appParams: {"initialProps":{},"rootTag":1}. __DEV__ === true, development-level warning are ON, performance optimizations are OFF
E/ReactNativeJS(23449): Application UIExplorerApp has not been registered. This is either due to a require() error during initialization or failure to call AppRegistry.registerComponent.
```
